questions.question: What is the opposite of 'To withdraw'?
questions.explanation: To deposit (put money in) is the opposite of to withdraw (take money out).

questions.question: If you want to say that the bank doesn't open on Sunday, you say:
options: The bank don't open on Sunday.
The bank doesn't open on Sunday.
The bank not open on Sunday.
The bank doesn't opens on Sunday.

questions.question: What does 'To sign' mean?
options: To write your name on a document
questions.explanation: To sign is to write one's name as a way of agreeing or identifying.

questions.question: Select the correct short answer: 'Do you work here?'
questions.explanation: Questions with 'Do you...?' are answered with 'Yes, I do' or 'No, I don't'.
